WhyWe.whybottom: Işewürlik alyp barmak maksady bilen, biz önümleri we hyzmatlary görkezmek, täzelikleri paýlaşmak we hyzmatdaşlygy höweslendirmek üçin pudak boýunça gyzyklanýan taraplary, hünärmenleri we karar kabul edijileri jemleýän çäreleri gurnaýarys.  Çärelerimiziň guramaçylaryň, spikerleriň, hemaýatkärleriň, sergi gatnaşyjylarynyň, wekilleriň we myhmanlaryň işewürlik we hyzmatdaşlyk zerurlyklaryna laýyk gelmegini üpjün etmek üçin biz hökümetler, milli kärhanalar, söwda-senagat palatalary, halkara söwda guramalary we hususy sektor bilen ýakyn hyzmatdaşlyk edýäris.      Biz sergileriň köplenç daşary ýurt maýadarynyň ýurda ilkinji saparyny alamatlandyrýandygyny we gowy täsir galdyrmagyň çäräniň hiline baglydygyny bilýäris.  Çärelerimiziň daşky gurşawa täsirini azaltmak we ýerli tejribäni ulanmak maksady bilen, biz jemgyýetçilik jogapkärçiligimizi kabul edýäris.  Türkmenistandaky merkezimizden dünýäniň dürli künjeklerinde iş alyp barýarys.
WhyWe.whyright: Oguz Forum – 2007-nji ýylda döredilen we Türkmenistanda söwda-senagat konferensiýalaryny we sergileri gurnamak boýunça ýöriteleşen hünärmen çäre guramaçysydyr.      Biz daşary ýurt maýa goýumlaryny höweslendirmek we ýurduň hem-de dünýäniň işewürlik jemgyýetiniň arasyndaky söwda gatnaşyklaryny ösdürmek maksady bilen, her ýyl sebitleýin we milli derejede pudaklaýyn çäreleri, ‘road show’ görnüşindäki söwda missiýalaryny we ýörite aýratyn çäreleri gurnaýarys.

OurServices.ourtext: Oguz Forum – energiýa senagatyna degişli halkara derejesinde çäreleri gurnamakda öňdebaryjy guramaçydyr. Biz öňdebaryjy energiýa kompaniýalary bilen hyzmatdaşlyk edýäris, olara strategik çäreleriň dolandyrylyşyny we gurnalmagyny berjaý etmäge kömek edýäris. Bizim täjirçilik toparymyz, müşderilerimiziň çäresiniň hilini ýokarlandyrmak, wagyz etmek we täze maýa goýumlaryny çekmek üçin täze döredilen düşünjelerden başlap, taslama dolandyryşy, marketing, aragatnaşyk, satuwlar, programma ösdürmek we spikerler bilen işleşmäge çenli ähli hyzmatlary hödürlemäge taýýar.

whoWeAre.text1:
Oguz Forum is a professional event organizer that was founded in 2007 and specializes in Turkmenistan, industry-focused trade conferences and exhibits for businesses and governments.

To encourage and enable direct foreign investment in and commerce between the host nation and the global business community, we organize yearly, regionally and nationally focused industry events, road show trade missions, and one-time special events.
whoWeAre.text2:
With the ultimate goal of conducting business, we create events that bring together stakeholders, experts, and decision makers in the industry to exhibit products and services, foster networking, and inspire collaboration.

To make sure that our events meet the networking and business development needs of our hosts, presenters, sponsors, exhibitors, delegates, and guests, we collaborate closely with governments, national businesses, chambers of commerce, international trade groups, and the private sector.  We are aware that trade exhibitions frequently serve as a foreign investor's first visit to your nation, and that making a good first impression depends heavily on the event's quality.
 In order to minimize the environmental impact of our events and to use local expertise in their development, we embrace our social responsibility.
 From our base in the Turkmenistan, we conduct business abroad.
